actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 US code, to provide that the administrator of veterans affairs may furnish outpatient dental services and treatment for a non-service connected disability to any war veteran who has a permanent total disability from a service connected disability.

summary.text: Provides that the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs may furnish outpatients dental services and treatment for a non-service-connected disability to any war veteran who has a permanent total disability from a service-connected disability. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 612)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 US code, to provide that the administrator of veterans affairs may furnish outpatient dental services and treatment for a non-service connected disability to any war veteran who has a permanent total disability from a service connected disability.
